variables.name: SA_NEXUS_URI
variables.desc: The domain name under which your Nexus registry is hosted.

variables.name: SA_NEXUS_SCHEMA
variables.desc: The schema of the nexus URL.

variables.name: SA_DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME
variables.desc: The name of the docker image. You can add '*' at the end to indicate that you are looking to delete images by their prefix.

variables.name: SA_DOCKER_IMAGE_TAG
variables.desc: The name of the docker tag image. You can add '*' at the end to indicate that you are looking to delete tags by their prefix.
